mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTING_ROOM ( CHAT_ID, CH_MEM_NO, CHAT_NAME, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_ID.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{chatName}, 'Y' )
INSERT INTO CHATTING_ROOM ( CHAT_ID, CH_MEM_NO, CHAT_NAME, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{chatId}, #{targetMemNo}, #{chatName}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT CR.CHAT_ID AS chatId, CR.CH_MEM_NO AS chMemNo, CR.CHAT_NAME AS chatName, CR.STATUS AS status, M.LAST_MESSAGE AS lastMessage FROM CHATTING_ROOM CR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MS_CHAT_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT AS LAST_MESSAGE FROM ( SELECT MS_CHAT_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MS_CHAT_ID ORDER BY SEND_TIME DESC) AS RN FROM MESSAGE ) WHERE RN = 1 ) M ON CR.CHAT_ID = M.MS_CHAT_ID WHERE CR.CH_MEM_NO = ( SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} )
